Posts.Content: Hi, I just read your post from a year ago, and I'm going through the same exact thing that you did. A BI-RAD 4 showed Grouping of suspicious Mirccalifications, on mammography on my yesterday and doctor recommend me to have a sterotactic-guided biopsy. I'm sick with worry!! Can you please tell me what was your outcome. Thank you.
Posts.Title: percentage of malignancy in clustered microcalcifications in one breast only
